articles.headline: Fort Worth Poised for Major Data Center Development in Texas Market
articles.content: A significant data center project has been approved for the Fort Worth metropolitan area, signaling continued growth in North Texas's robust digital infrastructure landscape. The approved facility represents another strategic expansion in a region increasingly attractive to hyperscale cloud providers and enterprise colocation customers seeking robust connectivity and business-friendly environments. While specific operational details remain limited, the project underscores the ongoing momentum in Texas's data center market, which continues to draw substantial investment from technology and infrastructure developers.

articles.headline: Amazon Web Services Expands Hyperscale Data Center Footprint in Indiana
articles.content: Amazon Web Services is actively constructing a new data center facility in New Carlisle, Indiana, signaling continued strategic infrastructure expansion in the Midwest region. The project represents AWS's ongoing commitment to building out its hyperscale computing infrastructure to support growing cloud computing and enterprise storage demands. While specific capacity details remain undisclosed, the investment underscores the company's continued momentum in developing critical data center assets across the United States.
